sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, PieChart, Pie, Cell, AreaChart, Area, RadarChart, PolarGrid, PolarAngleAxis, PolarRadiusAxis, Radar } from 'recharts'; import { Sprout, Droplets, Sun, TrendingUp, Leaf, Users, Calendar, MapPin, Cpu, Zap, Smartphone, Globe } from 'lucide-react'; import { cropData, weatherData, farmingTechniques, seedVarieties, aiInsights, sustainabilityMetrics, digitalTools, marketData, innovationProjects } from '../data/agricultureData'; import './Agriculture.css'; const Agriculture = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const COLORS = ['#2f855a', '#38a169', '#48bb78', '#68d391', '#9ae6b4', '#c6f6d5']; const soilData = [ { type: 'Clay Loam', percentage: 45, ph: 6.8, fertility: 'High', carbonContent: 3.2 }, { type: 'Sandy Loam', percentage: 35, ph: 6.2, fertility: 'Medium', carbonContent: 2.1 }, { type: 'Silt Loam', percentage: 20, ph: 7.1, fertility: 'High', carbonContent: 3.8 } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

AI-Powered Agricultural Intelligence

Revolutionary farming solutions combining artificial intelligence, IoT sensors, blockchain technology, and sustainable practices for refugee agriculture transformation.

94% AI Accuracy
500+ IoT Sensors
1,200 App Users
Blockchain Verified
{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{/* Content Sections */}
{activeTab === 'overview' && (

Smart Agricultural Overview

Real-Time Crop Performance Dashboard

Soil Health Analysis

{soilData.map((soil, index) => (
{soil.type} {soil.percentage}%
pH: {soil.ph} Carbon: {soil.carbonContent}% {soil.fertility} Fertility
))}

Climate Impact Metrics

1,250 Tons CO2 Sequestered
40% Water Usage Reduction
15 New Species Documented
)} {activeTab === 'ai' && (

AI & Machine Learning Solutions

{aiInsights.map((insight, index) => (
{insight.accuracy}%

{insight.type}

{insight.description}

{insight.impact}
))}

Machine Learning Models in Production

Crop Yield Predictor

Training Data: 50,000+ records Accuracy: 94.2% Last Updated: Real-time

Predicts optimal planting times and expected yields based on weather, soil, and historical data.

Disease Detection CNN

Image Dataset: 25,000+ photos Accuracy: 89.1% Response Time: <2 seconds

Computer vision model identifying crop diseases and pests from smartphone photos.

Weather Forecasting

Meteorological Data: 10 years Accuracy: 91.5% Forecast Range: 14 days

Hyperlocal weather predictions tailored for refugee settlement microclimates.

 )} {activeTab === 'sustainability' && (

Sustainability & Environmental Impact

Sustainability Scorecard

Carbon Sequestration Tracking

Total CO2 Sequestered

1,250 tons = 2,700 cars off road for 1 year

Monthly Sequestration Rate

104 tons/month 15% from last month

Biodiversity Conservation

15 New Species Documented
23% Increase in Pollinator Activity
8 Habitat Restoration Sites
)} {activeTab === 'digital' && (

Digital Agricultural Tools

{digitalTools.map((tool, index) => (

{tool.name}

{tool.users && Users: {tool.users}} {tool.coverage && Coverage: {tool.coverage}} {tool.flights && Flights: {tool.flights}} {tool.rating && Rating: {tool.rating}} {tool.accuracy && Accuracy: {tool.accuracy}}

Features:

    {tool.features.map((feature, fIndex) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}

IoT Sensor Network

500+ Active Sensors
24/7 Real-time Monitoring
95% Data Accuracy

Soil Sensors

pH, moisture, temperature, nutrient levels

Weather Stations

Temperature, humidity, rainfall, wind speed

Crop Monitors

Growth stage, health status, pest detection

 )} {activeTab === 'market' && (

Market Intelligence & Blockchain Traceability

Real-Time Market Prices

{marketData.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Crop Local Price (UGX/kg) Market Price (UGX/kg) Demand Season Profit Margin
{item.crop} {item.localPrice.toLocaleString()} {item.marketPrice.toLocaleString()} {item.demand} {item.season} +{Math.round(((item.marketPrice - item.localPrice) / item.localPrice) * 100)}%

Blockchain Supply Chain Tracking

1,200+ Products Tracked
100% Transparency
45 Market Partners

Farm

Seed to harvest tracking

Processing

Quality verification

Distribution

Transport monitoring

Retail

Consumer verification

 )} {activeTab === 'innovation' && (

Innovation Projects & Future Technologies

{innovationProjects.map((project, index) => (

{project.title}

{project.status}

{project.description}

Beneficiaries: {project.beneficiaries} Completion: {project.completion}%
))}

Emerging Technologies Pipeline

Satellite Monitoring

Real-time crop monitoring using satellite imagery and AI analysis

Q2 2025

Autonomous Drones

Automated crop spraying and monitoring using AI-powered drones

Q4 2025

Carbon Credit Marketplace

Platform for refugees to monetize carbon sequestration efforts

Q1 2026
)}
); }; export default Agriculture;
